article_title: 12 Attractive Stocks For 2014 That Performed Superbly In 2013

article_metadata.description: After having gotten too obsessed with the Fed's taper dance, investors should now go back to basic investing -- picking fundamentally sound and attractively valued stocks.
article_metadata.author: Gene Marcial
